statements.statement:
SELECT A.*,B.menu_name p_name FROM t_power_res_menu_info A left join t_power_res_menu_info B on A.pri_menu_id = B.menu_id where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( A.menu_name like '%${key}%' or A.menu_code like '%${key}%' or A.menu_url like '%${key}%' or A.menu_icon like '%${key}%' or A.menu_desc like '%${key}%' or A.node_path like '%${key}%' or A.createby_name like '%${key}%' or A.updateby_name like '%${key}%'
) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and A.menu_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and A.menu_id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.menu_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.code??> and A.menu_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and A.menu_order = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.url??> and A.menu_url = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.url)}' </#if>
<#if query.icon??> and A.menu_icon = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.icon)}' </#if>
<#if query.description??> and A.menu_desc = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.description)}' </#if>
<#if query.pid??> and A.pri_menu_id = ${query.pid} </#if>
<#if query.type??> and A.menu_type = ${query.type} </#if>
<#if query.level??> and A.menu_level = ${query.level} </#if>
<#if query.nodePath??> and A.node_path like '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.nodePath)}%' </#if>
<#if query.createUserId??> and A.createby = ${query.createUserId} </#if>
<#if query.createUserName??> and A.createby_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.updateUserId??> and A.updateby = ${query.updateUserId} </#if>
<#if query.updateUserName??> and A.updateby_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.idNotIn??> and A.menu_id not in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.idNotIn)}) </#if>
<#-- 获取角色的菜单 --> <#if query.roleId??> and A.menu_id in (select menu_id from T_POWER_ROLE_MENU_OPERATION where role_id = ${query.roleId}) </#if>
<#-- 获取用户授权的菜单 --> <#if query.userId??> and A.menu_id in ( select menu_id from T_POWER_ROLE_MENU_OPERATION where role_id in( select role_id from T_POWER_DUTIES_ROLE where duties_id in ( select duties_id from t_user_duties where user_id =${query.userId}))) </#if>
<#if query.sortOrder?? && query.sortField??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} <#else> order by menu_order </#if> </#if>
SELECT A.*,B.menu_name p_name FROM t_power_res_menu_info A left join t_power_res_menu_info B on A.pri_menu_id = B.menu_id where 1=1
